data.prayer: Father, help the 16,726 believers in Santarém to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santarém, Portugal
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Santarém, Portugal. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 28 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Santarém, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Santarém, Portugal to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Turk people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Turk people.
Father, help your children in Santarém, Portugal find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Santarém, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.section_summary:
the state of Santarém, Portugal has a population of 475,300.

We estimate Santarém has 16,726 people who might know Jesus, 424,298 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 34,276 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 28 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 424,298 cultural Christians in the state of Santarém to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'
